channel.title: CVE Feed for Go Web Solutions -- WP Customer Reviews
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go Web Solutions -- WP Customer Reviews

item.title: CVE-2021-24296|2024-08-03T19:28:23.433Z -- go%20web%20solutions -- wp%20customer%20reviews
item.description: The WP Customer Reviews WordPress plugin before 3.5.6 did not sanitise some of its settings, allowing high privilege users such as administrators to set XSS payloads in them which will then be triggered in pages where reviews are enabled
